name: Mask of Uroboros
ability: Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card and Spawn 2 Crows on your Melee row.

name: Blood Eagle
ability:
Echo.
Damage an enemy unit by 2, then play a Warrior from your deck with a provision cost of 7 or less.
Deathblow: Play a Warrior from your deck instead.
Bloodthirst 3: Always trigger the Deathblow ability.

name: Eist Tuirseach
ability:
Veteran.
Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card.
Bloodthirst 3: Gain Zeal.
Whenever you Discard a non-Neutral unit during your turn, Summon it from your graveyard to this row.
Counter: 2
Devotion: Also works whenever a non-Neutral unit enters your graveyard during your turn.

name: Harald an Craite
ability:
Deploy: Play a bronze Warrior from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
Devotion: At the start of the third round, evolve to Harald the Cripple.

name: Harald the Cripple
ability:
Veil.
Deploy: Play a bronze Warrior from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
Whenever you play a Warrior, damage a random enemy unit by 1.

name: King Bran
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Boost self by 1 whenever excess damage is dealt to enemy units.
At the start of the game, trigger the Veteran ability of your units.

name: Tyrggvi Tuirseach
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by its base power.

name: Hjalmar an Craite
ability: Deploy (Melee): Banish a unit in your graveyard and damage an enemy unit by its power.

name: Skjordal Drummond
ability:
Devotion: Veteran.
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by Skjordal's base power.

name: Madman Lugos
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage an enemy unit by twice the number of damaged enemies.

name: Svanrige Tuirseach
ability: Deploy: Boost self by the base power of the last non-Neutral unit that went to your graveyard this round.

name: Draig Bon-Dhu
ability:
Deploy: Move a bronze Warrior from your deck to your graveyard.
Zeal. Order: Trigger the Veteran ability of a unit in your graveyard.

name: An Craite Raiders
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy (Bloodthirst 3): Gain Zeal.
Order: Damage a unit by 2.

name: War of Clans
ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Deathblow: Play a up to 2 provision cost Warrior from your graveyard and give it Doomed.
Devotion: Always trigger the Deathblow ability.

name: Highland Warlord
ability:
Veteran.
Deploy: Increase the damage of your Raid cards by 1 for the rest of the game.

name: An Craite Warrior
ability: Deploy: Give an enemy unit Bleeding (3). If played from the graveyard, damage an enemy unit by 3 instead.

name: Brokvar Archer
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Damage an enemy unit by 1 plus the number of damaged units your opponent controls.

name: Brokvar Warrior
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 3.
If the target is damaged, repeat the Deploy ability with a different target and decrease the damage by 1.

ability:
Veil.
Veteran.

name: Tuirseach Skirmisher
ability: When this unit is Discarded, Summon it from your graveyard to your Melee row.

name: Lippy Gudmund
ability: Deploy (Ranged): Swap your graveyard with your deck.

name: Morkvarg: Heart of Terror
ability: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Repeat until the target is damaged.

name: Morkvarg
ability: When this unit enters your graveyard during the round, Summon it to your Melee row and give it Doomed.

name: Abordage
ability:
Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Bloodthirst 2: Also play a Pirate from your hand, then draw a card.

name: Dimun Pirate
ability: Deploy: Move the top card from your deck to your graveyard. If you control a Ship, cancel this ability.

name: Drummond Warmonger
ability:
Deploy: Damage 3 adjacent enemies by 1.
Bloodthirst 4: Damage all enemies on a row by 1 instead.

name: Seagull
ability: Bloodthirst 5: Summon self from your deck to your Ranged row.

ability:
Zeal. Order: Draw a card, then Discard a card.

ability: Deploy (Ranged): Draw a card, then Discard a card.

name: Coral
ability: Deploy (Melee): Damage all damaged enemy units by 1, then damage all enemy units by 1.

name: Naval Supremacy
ability: Play a bronze Skellige Ship from your deck and Spawn a Cataclysm in enemy row for 1 turn.

name: An Craite Longship
ability: Melee: Whenever your opponent plays a unit on their side of the battlefield, damage it by 1.

name: Funeral Boat
ability: Whenever a card enters either graveyard during your turn, damage a random enemy unit by 1.

name: Whale Harpooner
ability: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row, then damage it by the number of units on that row.
